task.title: Enabling the Waitlist for Ticket Types and Schedule Items
task.abstract: The waitlist for ticket types and schedule items allows users to view an event and sign up for the waitlist if the desired event or sessions are full. The user will not be required to complete the event registration process until contact is made regarding availability. Staff users can override waitlists by selecting the Enable Waitlisting checkbox on the Event record.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Event record and select the Enable Waitlisting checkbox.
Enter a value for the Capacity field. Click Save.
step.info: The Capacity field is conditionally required if the Enable Waitlisting checkbox is selected, however, it is best practice to populate the field regardless because, unless waitlists are enabled, the event is automatically closed upon reaching capacity.

step.cmd: Select the ticket type from the Ticket Type related list and select the Enable Waitlist checkbox. Click Save.
step.info: Alternatively, select the schedule item from the Schedule related list and select the Enable Waitlist checkbox.

taskbody.result:
The waitlist is enabled for the ticket type and schedule item.
Staff users can manually register a waitlisted user.
